thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Copper and Gold Prices Slip as Dollar Strengthens

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Copper and Gold Prices Slip as Dollar Strengthens
text:
Copper prices fell to their lowest level since December on Wednesday, as oil prices declined and the dollar rose.
Copper for March delivery closed down 3.2% at $3.0875 a pound on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange.
Oil sold off sharply after data showed U.S. production blasted above 10 million barrels a day last week....
